quotes.quote: The less of the World, the freer you live.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: The Devil'S Voice Is Sweet To Hear.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Earning of livelihood by following some profession is better than living on charity.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: Even the greatest was once a beginner. Don't be afraid to take that first step.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The worst man is the one who sees himself as the best.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: A Wise Man Can Learn More From A Foolish Question Than A Fool Can Learn From A Wise Answer.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: If Allah wants for a people ill, he gives them debates and takes away from them actions.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: You may learn to imitate a birdcall, but do you experience what the nightingale feels for the rose?
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: How many lessons there are and how little they are taken.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: Developing nations want to become developed nations.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Money cannot help lifting its head.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: Nothing hurts a good soul and kind heart more than to live amongst people who can't understand it.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: Confidence and hard work is the best medicine to kill the disease called failure. It will make you successful person.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: The chess master says nothing, other than moving the silent chess piece.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: You Have Enemies? Good. That Means You'Ve Stood Up For Something, Sometime In Your Life.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Whoever Would Overthrow The Liberty Of A Nation Must Begin By Subduing The Freeness Of Speech.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To fight against the infidels is Jihad; but to fight against your evil self is greater Jihad.
quotes.author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quotes.quote: As We Express Our Gratitude, We Must Never Forget That The Highest Appreciation Is Not To Utter Words, But To Live By Them.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: If You Have A Particular Faith Or Religion, That Is Good. But You Can Survive Without It.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: When We Lose One Blessing, Another Is Often Most Unexpectedly Given In Its Place.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Do not overeat; that invites disease.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: Life Well Spent Is Long.
quotes.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quotes.quote: It Is The Supreme Art Of The Teacher To Awaken Joy In Creative Expression And Knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To make one good action succeed another, is the perfection of goodness.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: A moment of patience in a moment of anger prevents a thousand moments of regret.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: Dream, Dream Dream Dreams transform into thoughts And thoughts result in action.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: There is hope after despair and many suns after darkness.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: O World, try to deceive someone else. Are you trying to tempt me or attract me? No way! I divorce you irrevocably. Your time is short and you are insignificant. Alas! The provision is little, the journey is long and the way is lonely.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: Open your Eyes, for this World is only a Dream.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Let Us Live So That When We Come To Die Even The Undertaker Will Be Sorry.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A Subject For A Great Poet Would Be God'S Boredom After The Seventh Day Of Creation.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I Have Offended God And Mankind Because My Work Didn'T Reach The Quality It Should Have.
quotes.author: Leonardo Da Vinci

quotes.quote: The Hunger For Love Is Much More Difficult To Remove Than The Hunger For Bread.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Failure Is Simply The Opportunity To Begin Again, This Time More Intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Do not be misled by hearing of anyone's reputation.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)

quotes.quote: A Lie Gets Halfway Around The World Before The Truth Has A Chance To Get Its Pants On.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: When learning is purposeful, creativity blossoms. When creativity blossoms, thinking emanates. When thinking emanates, knowledge is fully lit. When knowledge is lit, economy flourishes.
quotes.author: Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: No wealth like education and no poverty like ignorance.
quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib (R.A)

quotes.quote: Many A Man Thinks He Is Buying Pleasure, When He Is Really Selling Himself To It.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Failure Is A Detour, Not A Dead-End Street.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: As Soon Go Kindle Fire With Snow, As Seek To Quench The Fire Of Love With Words.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Disneyland Is A Show.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Fear Is The Main Source Of Superstition, And One Of The Main Sources Of Cruelty. To Conquer Fear Is The Beginning Of Wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: When One Has Not Had A Good Father, One Must Create One.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Isn'T It Strange That I Who Have Written Only Unpopular Books Should Be Such A Popular Fellow?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The Greatest Discovery Of All Time Is That A Person Can Change His Future By Merely Changing His Attitude.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Take account of your deeds before they are taken account of.
quotes.author: Umar ibn Al-Khattāb (R.A)
